props.title: About Us - New York Sash | Central NY's Home Improvement Experts
Your Trusted Home Improvement Partner
props.subtitle: For over four decades, New York Sash has been transforming homes throughout Central New York with premium windows, siding, bathrooms, and entry doors.

props.title: Your Trusted Local Partner
props.description: For over four decades, New York Sash has been Central New York's premier home improvement company. What started as a small family business has grown into the region's most trusted name for windows, siding, bathrooms, and entry doors.
props.additionalText: We understand that your home is your most important investment. That's why we're committed to providing the highest quality products, expert installation, and exceptional customer service that has earned us thousands of satisfied customers and an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau.

props.title: Our Story
props.subtitle: From humble beginnings to regional leader - see how we've grown while maintaining our commitment to quality and service.

timelineItems.title: Company Founded
timelineItems.description: New York Sash was established as a family-owned business with a simple mission: provide quality home improvement products and exceptional service to Central New York homeowners.

timelineItems.title: First Showroom Opens
timelineItems.description: Opened our first showroom in Whitesboro, NY, allowing customers to see and touch our products before making decisions. This hands-on approach became a cornerstone of our business.

timelineItems.title: Expanding Services
timelineItems.description: Added bathroom remodeling and entry door installation to our services, becoming a full-service home improvement company.

timelineItems.title: ENERGY STAR Partnership
timelineItems.description: Became an ENERGY STAR partner, focusing on energy-efficient products that help homeowners save money and reduce environmental impact.

timelineItems.title: Advanced Installation Training
timelineItems.description: Implemented comprehensive training programs for our installation teams, ensuring every project meets the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.

timelineItems.title: Digital Innovation
timelineItems.description: Embraced digital tools and virtual consultations to better serve customers while maintaining our personal touch and commitment to excellence.

timelineItems.title: Leading the Industry
timelineItems.description: Continuing to lead Central New York's home improvement industry with innovative products, expert installation, and unmatched customer service.

props.title: Our Core Values
props.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do and ensure every customer receives the exceptional experience they deserve.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We believe in honest communication, fair pricing, and always doing what's right for our customers.

values.title: Quality
values.description: We use only the finest products and employ skilled craftsmen who take pride in their work.

values.title: Service
values.description: Every customer interaction is an opportunity to exceed expectations and build lasting relationships.

values.title: Community
values.description: We're proud to be part of Central New York and support our local communities.

values.title: Expertise
values.description: Continuous training and education ensure our team stays at the forefront of industry innovations.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We promote energy-efficient solutions that benefit both our customers and the environment.

props.title: Certifications & Recognition
props.subtitle: Our commitment to excellence has earned us industry recognition and the trust of our customers.

Professional Grab Bars - Strategically placed support bars provide stability when entering and exiting your bathroom
Built-In Seating - Comfortable molded seating for those who need to sit while showering
Temperature Control - Anti-scald valves and easy-to-use controls with water temperature limits
